entry.title: Remember how we used to be able to recycle soft plastics in supermarkets in Australia? Well they’re now racing to find a solution to this growing environmental problem. #australia #news #green #environment #activism #recycle #recycling #plastic #waste #au

entry.title: Australia’s winter weather has been wild. This weekend was as much as 8 degrees warmer than the July average high temperatures in some parts, including Sydney that got up to 25.2C on Saturday. So what’s going on? #australia #news #weather #winter #climate
entry.content: Australia’s winter weather has been wild. This weekend was as much as 8 degrees warmer than the July average high temperatures in some parts, including Sydney that got up to 25.2C on Saturday. So what’s going on? #australia #news #weather #winter #climatechange #globalwarming #globalboiling #sydney #sydneyweather #emissions #energy #auspol #politics #pollution #todayilearned #learnontiktok
